summary.para: Indicates that the suspend process is starting and resources should be brought into a consistent state.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The actual suspend is about to occur and no more calls will be made into the Content Decryption Module (CDM).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Used to enable the client to notify the Content Decryption Module (CDM) when global resources should be brought into a consistent state prior to suspending.
